Title: Core Platform Foundation
Description: Establish foundational platform architecture including React application, routing, state management, and core UI framework
Acceptance Criteria: ✅ React application running with hot reload; ✅ Multi-page navigation operational; ✅ Centralized state management working; ✅ Dark/light theme system functional; ✅ Professional Cognizant branding integrated

Title: Agent Network Management
Description: Enable users to discover, load, organize, and manage 50+ agent networks from Neuro SAN registry
Acceptance Criteria: ✅ 50+ networks discovered; ✅ Networks organized by category; ✅ Load any network for visualization; ✅ Update agent configurations

Title: Visual Flow Canvas
Description: Interactive visual canvas displaying agent networks as graph diagrams with real-time execution visualization
Acceptance Criteria: ✅ Interactive graph visualization; ✅ Drag-and-drop nodes; ✅ Real-time execution animation; ✅ Zoom, pan, minimap controls

Title: Agent Configuration System
Description: Comprehensive 7-tab configuration interface for customizing all agent aspects
Acceptance Criteria: ✅ 7-tab drawer implemented; ✅ All properties editable; ✅ 58+ tools selectable; ✅ 9+ MCP servers configurable; ✅ Unsaved changes protection

Title: AI-Powered Network Designer
Description: Integrate AI-powered network design using Gemini 2.5 Pro API with visual architecture plans
Acceptance Criteria: ✅ Natural language network description; ✅ Gemini 2.5 Pro API integration operational; ✅ Mermaid diagram visualization working; ✅ Plan approval workflow implemented; ✅ Dual engine support

Title: Real-Time Communication
Description: Implement WebSocket-based real-time communication supporting chat and execution logs and internal agent messages
Acceptance Criteria: ✅ WebSocket chat connection established; ✅ Real-time execution logs streaming; ✅ Internal agent-to-agent messages visible; ✅ Markdown message rendering with code blocks; ✅ Connection state management and recovery; ✅ Session-based isolation

Title: Component & Tool Library
Description: Comprehensive library of 58+ tools and 9+ MCP servers with visual browsing interface
Acceptance Criteria: ✅ 58+ tools documented and accessible; ✅ 9+ MCP servers available; ✅ Visual browsing with category organization; ✅ Search and filter functionality; ✅ Drag-and-drop integration

Title: Execution & Monitoring
Description: Comprehensive execution monitoring with real-time logs and performance metrics and agent chain visualization
Acceptance Criteria: ✅ Real-time execution logs streaming; ✅ Agent delegation chain visualization; ✅ Performance metrics tracking; ✅ Token usage accounting; ✅ Visual execution trace on canvas

Title: User Interface Polish
Description: Polish user interface with professional design and smooth animations and responsive layouts
Acceptance Criteria: ✅ Consistent design system across all components; ✅ Smooth animations and transitions; ✅ Loading states for all async operations; ✅ Comprehensive error handling with user feedback; ✅ Responsive layouts adapting to screen sizes; ✅ Accessibility basics
